    Kunsong Zhao

    Ph.D. Candidate

    • Department of Computing, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University
    • Hong Kong SAR
    • Email
    • Google Scholar

    Kunsong is currently a Ph.D candidate in Computer Science at Department of Computing, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University (PolyU), under the supervision of Prof. Daniel Xiapu Luo and co-supervision of Prof. Lei Xue. Before that, he received his Master and Bachelor degrees in Software Engineering from Wuhan University in 2022 and Hubei University in 2019, respectively. His research interests lie in designing security systems and improving software quality with the help of static and dynamic program analysis, formal verification, and deep learning techniques. Currently, he mainly focuses on binary analysis, blockchain and smart contract security, and decentralized applications.
